name: Honest Dating Expansion Pack
backDesc:
What if dating was
 as simple as getting to know
 another human being?
preview: How honest are your dating experiences, really?

Dating doesn't have to be a game, it can be as simple as getting to know another human being. Discovering compatibility with another person is only possible when we show up as our true selves, but we have to be willing to let our true selves be seen.
This dating explansion pack can be added to the original WNRS card game. Each player alternates between asking and answering each question. How do you win? Stay honest.
questions:
Just by looking at me,
 what would you think
 I do for a living?

What do you think my type
 is? Describe in detail.

What do you think my
 drink of choice is?

How many relationship do
 you think I've been in? How
 many times do you think I've
 been in love? Explain.

What do you think I was like
 in high school? Explain.

Do you think I'm still on
 good terms with my
 exes? Why or why not?

What was the first thing
 you noticed about me when
 we met in person?

Wild Card Write down your 3 favorite
 physical features of your
 partner and read them out
 loud. Both players.

What are you feeling
 a lot lately?

Do you have any
 unconventional opinions
 when it comes to romantic
 relationships?

I know I really like
 someone when _________.

Has sex ever been a
 deal breaker in your
 past relationships?
 Explain.

When's the last time you
 ghosted someone and why?

What about me intrigued
 you besides my physical
 appearance?

What do your friends know
 about me, if anything?

What part of your job
 energizes you the most?
 Leaves you the most
 drained?

How has your view on love
 evolved over time, if at all?
How do you define "Dating"?

Describe your worst
 heartbreak. What did
 it teach you?

Have you ever considered
 an open relationship?
 Why or why not?

Who in your life do you feel
 most yourself around? Why?

Which one of your parents'
 personality traits do you
 want to keep? Let go of?

What is something new
 you've learned about
 yourself recently?

What's the hardest
 part about dating you?

What are you overthinking
 right now?

What have you tolerated
 from others in the past
 that you no longer have
 space for?

What dating advice would you
 give your younger self?

How emotionally available do
 you currently feel? Explain.

What has being
 single taught you
 about yourself?

What was the worst
 date you've ever been
 on and why?

What about you has felt
 repeatedly misunderstood
 by others, if anything?

What's a
 non-negotiable
 in your life?

What did the people who raised
 you teach you about love? How
 has that shaped your views on
 love today?

Wild Card Write down your top 2
 relationship deal breakers.
 Both players. Compare.

Wild Card Write down your favorite
 song lyric you can think of
 off the top of your head.
 Compare and explain.

Wild Card Share something you
 typically wouldn't on a
 first date. Both players.

Wild Card Give each other tattoos
 with the nearest pen or
 marker. 30 seconds.

Wild Card Write down the top 3 most
 important qualities in a romantic
 partner. Both players. Compare.

Wild Card Think of the most underrated
 show streaming currently. On the
 count of 3, say your answers out
 loud. Both players.

What song should I listen
 to on my way home?

Based on what you've learned
 about me, what do you think I'm
 looking for romantically?

On a scale of 1-10 how
 "Emotionally available"
 do I seem? Explain.

What mannerisms of
 mine stood out the
 most to you, if any?

How would you describe
 our date in one word?

If you were to write
 my dating profile bio,
 what would it say?

What part of my personality
 isn't showcased online?

What do you find most
 attractive about me that
 isn't physical?

Wild Card Look through each other's
 social media. Pick your favorite
 photo. Compare and explain.

Wild Card Write your partner a text outside
 of your comfort zone at this end
 of this date. Both players.

Wild Card Ask literally anything.
 Permission to go there.
